long_desc.thetext: It would be great if there would be a TitledBorder decorator because that is a very commonly used ui component which is pressent in most toolkits. I have created a simple one for a project by extending qx.ui.decoration.Beveled. This is not the best solution and many things are quick'n'dirty because I did not know things like how to find the parent's background color (or this parent's if the parent has none). I can post the code here, but I think for one with some widget development knowledge it's a matter of very little time to reimplement it in a clean way.
Hi, Michael. Just to make sure there isn't a misunderstanding: Aren't you looking for features the groupbox already provides?? See http://qooxdoo.org/documentation/widget/groupbox
As far as I can see, a titled border is called group box in the context of qooxdoo. So I close the bug was worksforme. If you disagree, just reopen and let me know what I'm missing.
